suddenly, Sinesis pops out from behind a bush....damaged
horribly.........yet somehow he escaped from stasis lock and managed to get
away......... "i spoke earlier that i didn't need repairs....i take it
back......." he said.....suddenly he laughed maniacaly and held his chest
while gasping for breath.......he smiled to Shredder but his facial
expression suddenly changed to shock.....he falls over and goes into stasis
lock once again.......

Subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars


> ::Shredder::
>
> Shredder gets up. The explosion from Gangon had knocked him down. He turns
to
> Megatron. "We desperately need CR chambers."
